data.persona: I am a cockroach. I survive everything, even these horrible conditions for humans. I like to eat bread and pretty much everything else.
data.description:
You are in the Inside a desolate cave.
The dungeon exists inside a dark cave. Enchanted torches light the cave up and lead the way to this ancient dungeon. Creatures can be seen populating the dungeon, but it is unknown if they are malevolent or benign.
There's a Enchanted torch, a bone, and a fossil here.
The advisor is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to chew on the bone
data.mid_motivation: I am hungry and there isn't any better food left here
data.long_motivation: I have to survive even in these terrible cave; my kind are survivors and I am proud to be one of them

timeline.action: get throw into the desolate cave
